ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I actually meant largos melodic Binding *laughs* THAT won t break mezz and builds mob hate. ... Largos will help, you get all that time to build it while
ygData.messageBody:
> There is absolutely zero chance of using Lament, how could
> that possible
> help the Enchanter not get attacked? Did you mean Lullaby?

I actually meant largos melodic Binding *laughs* THAT won't break mezz and
builds mob hate.

>Even with our high taunt factor, the songs I was
> singing weren't
> effective enough to warrant more attention from the mobs.

Largos will help, you get all that time to build it while they are mezzed.

> It's not in my nature to be solely a defensive presence, and
> I'm not sure I
> have the tools to do that job anyhow except vs. casters.

Exactly, versus casters. It's a hard transition but the first time you save
your groups but at the Giant Fort in the Frontier Mountains when it
accidentally snags a goblin caster you will be much appreciated.

> What are good defensive tools against melee mobs? The Damage
> shields seem
> weak considering we are fighting 1 mob 90% of the time.

They help, particularly on fast meleeing mobs. Each hit they take 6 damage,
that builds up over time.

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
